mapper.insert: insert into tRecipeBoard (sRecipeTitle, sRecipeName, sRecipePhoto, sRecipeContent, sRecipeTime, sRecipeDifficulty, sRecipeServing, sRecipeIngredient, dtRecipeCreatedAt, dtRecipeUpdatedAt) values (#{sRecipeTitle}, #{sRecipeName}, #{sRecipePhoto}, #{sRecipeContent}, #{sRecipeTime}, #{sRecipeDifficulty}, #{sRecipeServing}, #{sRecipeIngredient}, now(), now());
mapper.select: select * from tRecipeBoard order by sRecipeTitle
